author: James Irvine
description: Method: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass over a chunk of block ice.Special ingredient #1: Rosemary oil (1:1 Rosemary stalks to a high-quality olive oil, left at room temperature for 24 hours.)
name: Bocado
